item.title: Parallel Coordinates
item.description: Playing with parallel coordinates Yaayy!

item.title: Power consumption in California
item.description:
This post aims to provide a fast look into Californian's net load

The data is collected through the Pyiso API, the data can also be fetched on CAISO

How is power generation evolving ?

A couple of plots from making the parallel coordinate plot.
